segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's move on to some personal details. Can you tell me your first name and last name? Also, do you have a title you prefer to use?
segments.client_message: Sure! My first name is Alex, and my last name is Taylor. I usually just go by Alex, no title needed, thanks!

segments.advisor_message: Great, Alex! And how about your date of birth? This will really help me understand your financial needs better.
segments.client_message: Actually, I was thinking about it, and I should change that. I was born on 15-07-1985, not 20-07-1985 like I mentioned before. Sorry for the mix-up!
